text:
#winewithdewine
Testing people doesn't solve problem.  I can be tested on Monday, go to Giant Eagle, fill up my gas tank, get some Nyquil at CVS and contract the virus on Friday.  Just b/c you test negative today doesn't mean you cant get it tomorrow or the next day.
